metadata.title: CVE-2023-40546 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw was found in Shim when an error happened while creating a new ESLvariable. If Shim fails to create the new variable, it tries to print anerror message to the user; however, the number of parameters used by thelogging function doesn't match the format string used by it, leading to acrash under certain circumstances.

criterions.comment: secureboot-db package in trusty/esm is affected and may need fixing.
shim-signed: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'install media keys will never be revoked').
shim: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'install media keys will never be revoked').
